mapper.select: select c.boardNum, c.productNum, c.userNum, c.boardContent, c.boardTitle, c.boardViews, c.boardDate, u.userName, u.userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comment cm WHERE cm.boardNum = c.boardNum) AS commentCount from Community c, User u where c.userNum = u.userNum order by c.boardNum desc

select c.boardNum, c.productNum, c.userNum, c.boardContent, c.boardTitle, c.boardViews, c.boardDate, u.userName, u.userId, p.productName from Community c, User u, Product p where c.userNum = u.userNum and c.productNum = p.productNum and c.boardNum = #{boardNum}
select c.commentNum, c.userNum, c.boardNum, c.comment, c.commentDateTime, u.userId from Comment c, User u where c.boardNum = #{boardNum} and u.userNum = c.userNum order by c.commentDateTime desc
select c.commentNum, c.userNum, c.boardNum, c.comment, c.commentDateTime, u.userId from Comment c, User u where commentNum = #{commentNum} and c.userNum = u.userNum
